content.description: An enjoyable, flowy V0. Start on obvious incut jug, right hand to little layback edge, left hand to a big flakey jug, right hand to a good sloper on the vertical face. Up and left to top out. Good feet all the way.
content.location: Find the obvious incut jug. See photos.

content.description: Lots of features on the face. Good feet the whole way. L to R.
content.protection: Good landing most of the way. No more than 5' up.
content.location: Start at the good and obvious incut jug - shared start with Under the Sun V0. Move left with good feet on jugs, pinches, crimps, and a slopey edge to finish around the corner.

content.description: My favorite line on this boulder. Start on a good, blocky left sidepull. Right hand on an alright sloped edge. Feet out left and low. Move up to a good ledge, left to a carved out rail, up to the big flakey jug shared with Under the Sun V0, left to a steep crimpy rail. Get established and get a high right foot. Move left to the large pinch and top out.
content.location: Left, blocky sidepull and a right sloped edge. Feet out left. Refer to pictures.
